marklogic.body:
The Proof of what Zimmerman said is on the tapes. The whole thing is caught on tape. They play the entire incident up to the two gun shots.
The injuries or lack thereof where also caught on 2 separate video tapes. No bloody clothes, no broken nose, no nose splint to stop the Bleeding, no grass stains, you can see it for yourself. The video does not lie, unlike yourself. Did I say Two videos@!
Zimmerman attacked and harrassed Trayvon who was just trying to walk home. Trayvon was in self defense of this maniac harrassing him with a gun. Trayvon Acted in self defense
